title: Unable to Click Play Button After Login
body: After I login to the game, I cannot click the Play button. It is disabled, and says, "We are unable to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open to try it again." I have re-opened four times. It still doesn't work.

replies.body: Sounds like your network is having a bit of a hard time getting a strong enough connection with our servers so it's unable to place you in a lobby. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying extra attention to the steps on port forwarding and firewalls.
